message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid I can't accept $950000. The product is worth a lot more to me than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'll offer it to you for $1050000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe it will bring to my business.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to accept $990000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll offer it to you for $1030000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1015000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe it will bring to my business.

I understand that you're still not willing to meet me at my desired price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $1060000. This is as low as I can go, and I hope you'll consider it. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1020000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe it will bring to my business.

I'm disappointed that we're still not close to a deal, Bob. I've made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll offer it to you for $1080000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1010000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe it will bring to my business. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
